category.name: Aptitude
category.description: Develop mathematical reasoning and problem-solving skills for competitive exams and interviews.

sub_categories.name: Series
sub_categories.description: Master number series, sequences, and pattern recognition techniques.

exercises.title: Basic Number Series
exercises.description: Identify and complete basic number series patterns.

tasks.title: Arithmetic Series Generator
tasks.question:
Create a function to generate arithmetic series.

Your function should:

  • Accept first term, common difference, and number of terms
  • Generate the arithmetic sequence
  • Calculate sum of the series
  • Find the nth term
  • Handle edge cases and validation
tasks.hint: Use formula: aₙ = a₁ + (n-1)d, sum = n/2 × (a₁ + aₙ)

tasks.title: Arithmetic Series Properties
tasks.question:
What is the common difference in the series: 3, 7, 11, 15, 19?

Consider: Difference between consecutive terms
tasks.hint: Subtract any term from the next term

tasks.title: Series Pattern Detector
tasks.question:
Implement a function to detect series patterns.

Your function should:

  • Identify arithmetic, geometric, and Fibonacci patterns
  • Predict the next term in the series
  • Calculate the pattern rule
  • Handle mixed patterns
  • Return pattern type and next term
tasks.hint: Check for common difference, common ratio, and recursive patterns

exercises.title: Geometric Series
exercises.description: Work with geometric series and their properties.

tasks.title: Geometric Series Calculator
tasks.question:
Create a geometric series calculator with various functions.

Your calculator should:

  • Generate geometric sequences
  • Calculate sum of finite and infinite series
  • Find nth term using formula
  • Handle convergence conditions
  • Validate input parameters
tasks.hint: Use formulas: aₙ = a₁ × r^(n-1), sum = a₁(1-r^n)/(1-r) for |r| < 1

tasks.title: Geometric Series Convergence
tasks.question:
When does an infinite geometric series converge?

Consider: Conditions for the sum to approach a finite value
tasks.hint: Think about what happens when the common ratio is between -1 and 1
options: When |r| < 1 - absolute value of ratio less than 1

tasks.title: Series Sum Calculator
tasks.question:
Implement a comprehensive series sum calculator.

Your calculator should:

  • Calculate sum of arithmetic series
  • Calculate sum of geometric series
  • Handle both finite and infinite series
  • Provide step-by-step solutions
  • Include error handling
tasks.hint: Use appropriate formulas for each series type, check convergence for infinite series
